words.description: A garment for the upper body made of cotton or a similar fabric, with a collar and sleeves, and buttons down the front.
An outer garment covering the body from the waist to the ankles, with a separate part for each leg.
A covering for the foot, typically made of leather, having a sturdy sole and not reaching above the ankle.
An outer garment extending either to the waist or the hips, typically having sleeves and a fastening down the front.
A shaped covering for the head worn for warmth, as a fashion item, or as part of a uniform.
A length of fabric worn around the neck or head.
A covering for the hand worn for protection against cold or dirt and typically having separate parts for each finger and the thumb.
A woman's outer garment fastened around the waist and hanging down around the legs.
A garment for the foot and lower part of the leg, typically knitted from wool, cotton, or nylon.
A one-piece garment for a woman or girl that covers the body and extends down over the legs.
